Hero.label: Personal Styling & Editorial
Hero.headline: Style, Confidence,
Hero.subheadline: Where your style communicates your essence. Elevate your presence with a wardrobe that speaks before you say a word.

About.title: Style Crafters to Communicate
About.description: AC Styling is your go-to destination for personalized styling experiences. We empower individuals to embrace their uniqueness by curating custom looks that reflect their true essence. With a passion for fashion and a keen eye for detail, we strive to deliver exceptional style solutions tailored to each client’s preferences, needs and personality.

personal_stylist.title: Personal Stylist
personal_stylist.description: Elevate your wardrobe with a stylist who helps refine your look and build outfits that match your lifestyle.

personal_shopping.title: Personal Shopping
personal_shopping.description: Skip the stress — we'll curate pieces that fit your style, shape, and budget, online or in-store.

closet_detox.title: Closet Detox
closet_detox.description: Declutter and organize your closet. We'll help decide what to keep, tailor, or let go with ease.

corporate_consulting.title: Corporate Consulting
corporate_consulting.description: Enhance your team's presence through dress code strategy, styling support, and image workshops.

t1.text: I recently had my baby and changed jobs. AC Styling gave my closet a refresh for my new lifestyle. I now dress for whatever the day brings without losing my own self

t2.text: Alejandra helped me to not lose my style while I make the transition into the professional world. Now I feel that I bring my true self to the workplace

t3.text: Alejandra built me a summer closet with easy to combine pieces and pre-made outfits. Helps me to not think about what I wear and still get approval nods from the wife.

detox.title: The Great Detox
detox.description: Editing your wardrobe with ruthlessness and grace.

Contact.label: Get in Touch
Contact.title: Elevate Your Style
Contact.description: Ready to define your personal brand? Contact us to schedule a consultation or learn more about our editorial styling services.

Footer.subtagline: Let your style do the talking.
